name: Trabajar Remoto
iconDescription: A claw hammer, as used for driving or removing nails. Generally depicted with a metal head and wooden handle, positioned at a 45¬∞ angle with the head at the upper left.

name: Personal Website
iconDescription: A rocket emoji being propelled into space
description: A place where i can share my thoughts and experience about technology. Your are seeing it right now! hope you like it.

name: Circuit Simulator
iconDescription: A light bulb, as screwed into a lamp to light a room. Depicted as an incandescent bulb with a silver base
description: A complete enviroment for students and teachers, related to circuit simulation. The teacher can create exercises uploading images, creating points and connections simulating any electronic device.

name: Tower Defense
iconDescription: A video game emoji, shown on major platforms as a console gamepad with D-pad, joysticks, and buttons
description: A little game created just with javascript, where you have to defend a tower from waves of enemies, but you have to be careful and try to not kill the allies that are trying to enter the tower!.

name: Arduino Mini Projects
iconDescription: A friendly, cartoon-styled whale, shown spouting water from its blowhole
description: Three mini projects created with Arduino as a web server, where you can visualize and control differents type of mechanisms and metrics.

name: Incident Manager
iconDescription: A flame, as produced when something is on fire. Depicted as a red, orange, and yellow flickering flame
description: A system formed by four modules that are communicated between them. The main objective is to have a system that receive incidents from differents types of agents, those incidents can be measured and visualized to be finally solved.
